Line 1: Line 1:
'''Occupy UC Davis''' is an ongoing series of [[Occupy Movement]] demonstrations at [[UC Davis]]. It is distinguished from the off-campus but allied [[Occupy Davis]]. Occupy UC Davis gained international attention on November 18, when University police were filmed pepper-spraying a group of protesters as they were peacefully seated.<ref>[http://www.csmonitor.com/USA/2011/1119/UC-Davis-pepper-spray-smear-tactics-Occupy-protests-face-rougher-response]</ref>
'''Occupy UC Davis''' is an ongoing series of [[Occupy Movement]] demonstrations at [[UC Davis]]. It is distinguished from the off-campus but allied [[Occupy Davis]]. Occupy UC Davis gained international attention on November 18, when University police were filmed pepper-spraying a group of protesters as they were peacefully seated.<ref>[http://www.csmonitor.com/USA/2011/1119/UC-Davis-pepper-spray-smear-tactics-Occupy-protests-face-rougher-response]</ref>
  +   +
<references />
